title: Barnacles could hold key to finding wreckage of Malaysia Airlines MH370
description: Scientists partially reconstruct debris drift path based on ocean temp data stored in shells.

title: California deploys AI-powered wildfire detection systems
description: New system scans over 1,000 cameras for signs of smoke—with 77 hits so far.

title: FDA cracks down on bogus anti-viral products from Amazon, Walmart
description: The products contain dilutions of a toxic agent found in absinthe.

title: Leaked Wipeout source code leads to near-total rewrite and remaster
description: "Either let it be, or shut this thing down and get a real remaster going."

title: Parallels Desktop 19 gets Sonoma-ready, expands OpenGL and Linux support
description: It's not the most exciting annual update, but there are some welcome additions.

title: Zoom’s CEO thinks Zoom sucks for building trust, leaked audio reveals
description: Everyone being friendly on Zoom stifles creativity, Zoom founder said.

title: Fox TV license renewal may be in jeopardy as FCC invites public response
description: FCC seeks broader public input on license renewal for WTXF-TV in Philadelphia.

title: Nvidia thinks AI boom is far from over as GPU sales drive big earnings win
description: Everybody wants GPUs for AI, and that's making Nvidia very happy (and rich).

title: Big Tech isn’t ready for landmark EU rules that take effect tomorrow
description: Starting Friday, the EU will require more transparency from platforms than ever.

title: The re-flight of a Rutherford engine demonstrates rocket reuse is here to stay
description: "The data is in, perfect performance from the reused engine."

title: Dealmaster: Herman Miller chairs, Labor Day deals, Apple gear, and more
description: Laptops from Lenovo and Apple, Herman Miller chairs, and Samsung tablets.

title: Gmail will lock important settings behind a pop-up 2FA challenge
description: Changes to email forwarding or filters will soon demand you verify who you are.

title: Hell freezes over as Apple supports right-to-repair bill
description: As California legislation nears finish line, Apple suddenly switches sides.

title: New robot searches for solar cell materials 14 times faster
description: RoboMapper saves both time and energy in searches for photovoltaic materials.

title: Musk unhappy with Cybertruck’s poor quality, calls for Lego-like precision
description: After driving a production prototype, Musk told his workers to do better.

title: Why we desperately need wild bees
description: Native pollinators are crucial for both ecology and agriculture.
